column4: i have a question about pidgin and irc...  can pidgin actually connect to a specific #channel?
using xchat right now... but was curious
You can add channels to the main buddy list they are listed under the Chat heading as opposed to Buddy or whatever.
use dd to overwrite the first 512bytes and see if that helps. Itll erase the MBR so you can start fresh if you like if there is corruption or errors.
